name: BubQuest
shortDescription: A vibrant and colorful bubble popping/shooter game with multiple levels, power-ups, and a competitive 'Hall of Fame'.
fullDescription:
BubQuest is an exciting bubble shooter game where players burst colorful bubbles to achieve high scores and earn prizes. The core gameplay involves matching colors and using power-ups, like the bomb, to clear the screen.

Key Features:

  • Classic Bubble Shooter: Engage in the satisfying, classic bubble-popping gameplay.
  • Power-Ups: Use Bomb power-ups to clear large groups of bubbles and strategize your moves.
  • Competitive Tracking: Track your best scores and climb the ranks in the 'Hall of Fame'.
